Hi Tom, do you come here often?.sv: Hej Tom, kommer du hit ofta?

I like to come here to read and enjoy th.en: I like to come here to read and enjoy the fresh air.
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.fr: J'aime venir ici pour lire et profiter de l'air frais
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.de: Ich komme gerne hierher, um zu lesen und die frische Luft zu genießen.
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.pl: Lubię tu przychodzić, by czytać i cieszyć się świeżym powietrzem
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.sv: Jag tycker om att komma hit för att läsa och njuta av den friska luften.
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.pt: Eu gosto de vir aqui ler e aproveitar o ar livre.
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.nl: Ik kom hier graag om te lezen en van de frisse lucht te genieten.
I like to come here to read and enjoy th.es: Me gusta venir aquí para leer y disfrutar del aire fresco.

That sounds nice. What book are you read.en: That sounds nice. What book are you reading?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.fr: Ça a l'air sympa. Quel livre lis-tu ?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.de: Das klingt nach Spaß. Welches Buch liest du?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.sv: Det låter trevligt. Vilken bok läser du?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.pt: Isso soa bem. Que livro lês?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.nl: Dat klinkt leuk. Welk boek lees je?
That sounds nice. What book are you read.es: Eso suena bien. ¿Qué libro estás leyendo?

I like to watch the people..en: I like to watch the people.
I like to watch the people..sv: Jag tycker om att titta på folk.
I like to watch the people..pt: Eu gosto de observar as pessoas.
I like to watch the people..nl: Ik vind het leuk om naar de mensen te kijken,” zegt Anna.
I like to watch the people..es: Me gusta observar a la gente.

Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.en: Me too! It's fun to see everyone having a good time.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.fr: Moi aussi ! C'est amusant de voir que tout le monde passe un bon moment.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.de: Ich auch! Es macht Spaß zu sehen, dass alle eine gute Zeit haben.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.pl: Ja też! Fajnie jest widzieć, że wszyscy dobrze się bawią.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.sv: Jag också! Det är kul att se alla som roar sig.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.pt: Eu também! É bom ver toda a gente a divertir-se.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.nl: Ik ook! Het is leuk om iedereen een goede tijd te zien hebben.
Me too! It's fun to see everyone having.es: A mí también. Es divertido ver a todos divertiéndose.

I also like watching the animals..en: I also like watching the animals.
I also like watching the animals..sv: Jag tycker också om att titta på djuren.
I also like watching the animals..pt: Eu também gosto de observar os animais.
I also like watching the animals..nl: Ik kijk ook graag naar de dieren.
I also like watching the animals..es: También me gusta ver a los animales.

Do you have a favorite animal here?.en: Do you have a favorite animal here?
Do you have a favorite animal here?.pl: Czy masz tu jakieś ulubione zwierzę?
Do you have a favorite animal here?.nl: Heb je een favoriete dier hier?

Do you like playing with the dogs here?.en: Do you like playing with the dogs here?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.fr: Tu aimes jouer avec les chiens ici ?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.de: Spielst du hier gerne mit den Hunden?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.pl: Lubisz bawić się z tutejszymi psami?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.sv: Tycker du om att leka med hundarna här?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.pt: Gostas de brincar com os cães aqui?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.nl: Speel je graag met de honden hier?
Do you like playing with the dogs here?.es: ¿Te gusta jugar con los perros aquí?

Detective stories are great, they are fu.en: Detective stories are great, they are full of surprises.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.fr: Les romans policiers sont super, ils sont pleins de surprises.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.de: Kriminalromane sind toll, sie stecken voller Überraschungen.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.pl: Powieści kryminalne są świetne, pełne niespodzianek.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.sv: Deckare är toppen, de är fulla av överraskningar.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.pt: Histórias de detetives são fantásticas, estão cheias de surpresas.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.nl: Detectiveverhalen zijn geweldig, ze zitten vol verrassingen.
Detective stories are great, they are fu.es: Las historias de detectives son geniales, están llenas de sorpresas.

Adventure novels are so exciting! They t.en: Adventure novels are so exciting! They take you to new places.
Adventure novels are so exciting! They t.fr: Les romans d'aventure sont si passionnants ! Ils t'emmènent dans de nouveaux endroits.
Adventure novels are so exciting! They t.es: ¡Las novelas de aventuras son tan emocionantes! Te llevan a nuevos lugares.

I really like the squirrels. They're so.en: I really like the squirrels. They're so cute!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.fr: J'aime beaucoup les écureuils. Ils sont si mignons !
I really like the squirrels. They're so.de: Ich mag Eichhörnchen sehr. Sie sind so süß!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.pl: Naprawdę lubię wiewiórki. Są takie urocze!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.sv: Jag gillar verkligen ekorrarna. De är så söta!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.pt: Eu adoro os esquilos. Eles são tão fofos!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.nl: Ik vind de eekhoorns erg leuk. Ze zijn zo schattig!
I really like the squirrels. They're so.es: Me gustan mucho las ardillas. ¡Son tan lindas!

I like the squirrels too!.nl: Ik vind de eekhoorns ook leuk!
I like the squirrels too!.es: ¡A mí también me gustan las ardillas!

Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.en: Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so happy.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.fr: Oui, j'aime les chiens. Les chiens ont toujours l'air si heureux.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.de: Ja, ich mag Hunde. Hunde sehen immer so glücklich aus.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.pl: Tak, lubię psy. Psy zawsze wyglądają na szczęśliwe.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.sv: Ja, jag älskar hundar. Hundar ser alltid så glada ut.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.pt: Sim, eu amo cães. Os cães parecem sempre tão felizes.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.nl: Ja, ik houd van honden. Honden zien er altijd zo blij uit.
Yes, I love dogs. Dogs always look so ha.es: Sí, me encantan los perros. Los perros siempre parecen tan felices.

I played with a dog earlier today..en: I played with a dog earlier today.
I played with a dog earlier today..fr: J'ai joué avec un chien plus tôt dans la journée.
I played with a dog earlier today..de: Ich habe früher am Tag mit einem Hund gespielt.
I played with a dog earlier today..sv: Jag lekte med en hund tidigare idag.
I played with a dog earlier today..pt: Eu brinquei com um cão hoje.
I played with a dog earlier today..nl: Ik heb eerder vandaag met een hond gespeeld.

I like watching them play too..en: I like watching them play too.
I like watching them play too..de: Ich sehe ihnen auch gerne beim Spielen zu.
I like watching them play too..sv: Jag tycker om att titta på när de leker också.
I like watching them play too..pt: Eu também gosto de os ver a brincar.
I like watching them play too..nl: Ik vind het ook leuk om ze te zien spelen.
I like watching them play too..es: A mí también me gusta verlos jugar.

What other kinds of books do you like?.en: What other kinds of books do you like?
What other kinds of books do you like?.fr: Tu aimes quels autres types de livres ?
What other kinds of books do you like?.de: Welche anderen Arten von Büchern magst du?
What other kinds of books do you like?.sv: Vilka andra typer av böcker tycker du om?
What other kinds of books do you like?.pt: De que outro tipo de livros também gostas?
What other kinds of books do you like?.nl: Van wat voor andere soorten boeken houd je?
What other kinds of books do you like?.es: ¿Qué otros tipos de libros te gustan?

I also read science fiction books..en: I also read science fiction books.
I also read science fiction books..fr: Je lis aussi des livres de science-fiction.
I also read science fiction books..pt: Eu também leio livros de ficção-científica.
I also read science fiction books..es: También leo libros de ciencia ficción.

Science fiction books make you think abo.en: Science fiction books make you think about the future.
Science fiction books make you think abo.fr: Les livres de science-fiction te font réfléchir à l'avenir.
Science fiction books make you think abo.de: Science-Fiction-Bücher lassen dich über die Zukunft nachdenken.
Science fiction books make you think abo.pl: Książki science fiction sprawiają, że myślisz o przyszłości.
Science fiction books make you think abo.sv: Science-fiction böcker får dig att tänka på framtiden.
Science fiction books make you think abo.pt: Livros de ficção-científica fazem-te pensar sobre o futuro.
Science fiction books make you think abo.nl: Sciencefictionboeken laten je aan de toekomst denken.
Science fiction books make you think abo.es: Los libros de ciencia ficción te hacen pensar en el futuro.

Maybe we can read one together sometime?.en: Maybe we can read one together sometime?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.fr: On pourrait peut-être en lire un ensemble un jour ?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.de: Vielleicht können wir ja irgendwann mal ein Buch zusammen lesen?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.sv: Vi kanske kan läsa en tillsammans någon gång?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.pt: Talvez possamos ler um livro juntos algum dia?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.nl: Misschien kunnen we er een keer samen één lezen?
Maybe we can read one together sometime?.es: Quizás podríamos leer uno juntos algún día.

We should talk about our favorite books.en: We should talk about our favorite books more often.
We should talk about our favorite books.fr: On devrait parler plus souvent de nos livres préférés.
We should talk about our favorite books.de: Wir sollten öfter über unsere Lieblingsbücher sprechen.
We should talk about our favorite books.pl: Powinniśmy częściej rozmawiać o naszych ulubionych książkach.
We should talk about our favorite books.sv: Vi borde prata om våra favoritböcker oftare.
We should talk about our favorite books.pt: Devíamos falar sobre os nossos livros favoritos mais vezes.
We should talk about our favorite books.nl: We zouden vaker over onze favoriete boeken moeten praten.
We should talk about our favorite books.es: Deberíamos hablar más a menudo sobre nuestros libros favoritos.

Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.en: Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh for a while.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.fr: Anna et Tom continuent de parler et de rire pendant un moment.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.de: Anna und Tom reden und lachen noch eine Weile weiter.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.pl: Anna i Tom kontynuują rozmowę i śmieją się przez chwilę.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.sv: Anna och Tom fortsätter att prata och skratta en stund.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.pt: A Anna e o Tom continuam a falar e a rir por um tempo.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.nl: Anna en Tom blijven nog een tijdje praten en lachen.
Anna and Tom continue to talk and laugh.es: Anna y Tom continúan hablando y riendo por un rato.

It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.en: It's getting dark and it's time to go home.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.fr: La nuit tombe et il est temps de rentrer à la maison.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.de: Die Nacht bricht an und es ist Zeit, nach Hause zu gehen.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.pl: Zapada noc i czas wracać do domu.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.sv: Det börjar bli mörkt och det är dags att åka hem.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.pt: Está a ficar escuro e é hora de ir para casa.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.nl: Het wordt donker en het is tijd om naar huis te gaan.
It's getting dark and it's time to go ho.es: Se está haciendo de noche y es hora de ir a casa.

Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..en: Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..fr: Anna dit au revoir à Tom et rentre chez elle.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..de: Anna verabschiedet sich von Tom und geht nach Hause.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..pl: Anna żegna się z Tomem i wraca do domu.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..sv: Anna säger hej då till Tom och åker hem.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..pt: A Anna despede-se do Tom e vai para casa.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..nl: Anna neemt afscheid van Tom en gaat naar huis.
Anna says goodbye to Tom and goes home..es: Anna se despide de Tom y se va a casa.

Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.en: Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. What about you?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.fr: Oui, je viens parfois ici pour me reposer. Et toi ?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.de: Ja, ich komme manchmal hierher, um mich zu entspannen. Und du?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.pl: Tak, czasami tu przychodzę, aby się zrelaksować. A ty?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.sv: Ja, jag kommer hit ibland för att koppla av. Och du då?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.pt: Sim, eu venho aqui para relaxar às vezes. E tu?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.nl: Ja, ik kom hier soms om me te ontspannen. En jij?
Yes, I come here sometimes to relax. Wha.es: Sí, vengo aquí a veces para relajarme. ¿Y tú?

I like to watch the people here..en: I like to watch the people here.
I like to watch the people here..de: Ich beobachte gerne die Menschen hier.
I like to watch the people here..sv: Jag gillar att titta på människorna här.
I like to watch the people here..pt: Eu gosto de observar as pessoas aqui.
I like to watch the people here..nl: Ik kijk hier graag naar de mensen.
I like to watch the people here..es: Me gusta observar a la gente aquí.
